  • Method Details

    • selectOption

      public int selectOption(int lowerBound, int upperBound, String initMsg, String errorMsg)
      Prompts the user to select an option within a given range and returns the selected option.
      Parameters:
      lowerBound - The lower bound of the range (inclusive).
      upperBound - The upper bound of the range (inclusive).
      initMsg - The initial message to display before prompting for input.
      errorMsg - The error message to display when an invalid option is selected.
      Returns:
      The selected option.

    • displayItemList

      public void displayItemList(ArrayList<Item> itemList)
      Displays the list of items and their availability.
      Parameters:
      itemList - The list of items to display.

    • selectItem

      public int selectItem(VendingMachine vm)
      Prompts the user to select an item from the vending machine.
      Parameters:
      vm - The vending machine.
      Returns:
      The index of the selected item.

      public boolean maintenanceFeaturesInput(VendingMachine vm)
      Takes user input for selecting a maintenance feature for a vending machine.
      Parameters:
      vm - The vending machine.
      Returns:
      True if the user wants to exit maintenance mode, false otherwise.

      Returns:

    • vendingMachineMenu

      public void vendingMachineMenu(VendingMachine vm, float currentBalance)
      Displays the menu for the vending machine, including the item list and current balance.
      Parameters:
      vm - The VendingMachine object representing the vending machine.
      currentBalance - The current balance in the vending machine.

    • vendingMachineInput

      public int vendingMachineInput(VendingMachine vm)
      Prompts the user to select an item from the vending machine for inspection.
      Parameters:
      vm - The VendingMachine object representing the vending machine.
      Returns:
      The index of the selected item in the item list.

    • itemMenu

      public boolean itemMenu(VendingMachine vm, Item item, float currentBalance)
      Displays the menu for an item in the vending machine and handles user input. Allows the user to purchase the item if it is available and the balance is sufficient.
      Parameters:
      vm - The VendingMachine object representing the vending machine.
      item - The Item object representing the item in the vending machine.
      currentBalance - The current balance in the vending machine.
      Returns:
      True if the item was purchased successfully, false otherwise.
